channel.title: How to change starter kit and starting message!
channel.description: How do I do this ?? I have no clue :(

item.title: How to change starter kit and starting message!
item.dc:creator: @blindbandit blindbandit
item.description:
@blindbandit wrote:

To change starting message you need to look in client.java (located in the source folder)

look for:
sM(“Welcome to your server”);

this should be one of the first things u should see when u login

If the strater is given when you make a new account and just login
You need to look in client.java again

look for this:
if(starter == 0){

Example of a server’s starter:
}
if(starter == 0){
starter = 1;
sM(“Here is your Starter package”);
showInterface(3559);
apset = true;
addItem(995, 100000000);
}

Just trial and error on what u want to add for the starter. Everything should be straight forward

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starter kit and starting message!
